content: next st repeat around = 12 r 28 each 2 sts with single_crochet decrease = 6 fasten_off sew safety eyes 6 sts apart between r 18 and 19 embroider mouth in red and nose in light pink - 3- copyright €andrea gaida 2010 crochet pattern abc-clown from andrea gaida akinnastisu for ravelry arms make one each in red and in blue starting with cräme changing to red or blue when indicated chain 2 in cräme r 1 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook = 6 r 2 2 single_crochet in each st around = 12 r 3 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat around = 15 r 4 single_crochet in each st around = 15 r 5 2 sts with single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next st repeat around = 10 changing colour in last st of r 5 r 6 single_crochet in each st around = 10 r 7 working in back loops only single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st repeat around = 15 r 8-10 single_crochet in each st around = 15 r 11 single_crochet in next 3 sts next 2 sts with single_crochet decrease repeat around = 12 r 12 single_crochet in next 2 sts next 2 sts with single_crochet decrease = 9 stuff arms if necessary take hook or pencil as tool r 13 single_crochet in next st next 2 sts with single_crochet decrease = 6 r 14 flatten arm for matching sts working through both layers sl in last 2 sts fasten_off leaving long end for sewing edge of arms working in yellow in front loops of r 7 insert hook from arm to hand join with sl chain 3 sl in next st in each st around fasten_off sew arms to body cap starting with red chain 2 r 1 4 single_crochet in second chain from hook = 4 r 2 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st 2 times = 6 r 3 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 2 times = 8 change to yellow in last st of r 3 r 4 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 2 times = 10 r 5 single_crochet in first st 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 3 sts = 12 r 6 single_crochet in next 5 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 2 times = 14 r 7 single_crochet in first 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 6 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts = 16 - 4- copyright €andrea gaida 2010 crochet pattern abc-clown from andrea gaida akinnastisu for ravelry change to blue in last st of 7 r 8 single_crochet in next 7 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 2 times = 18 r 9 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts repeat = 24 r 10 single_crochet in
